data.name: Kallax
data.detailed_description:
Gather your friends


Become aliens in a fantastic spaceshift that was built to imitate a very famous swedish furniture store and cooperate to complete orders. The twist you ask ? Only one of you has the instruction manual and they can't see what the others are doing.

Build incredible furnitures and also...


From a table to a whole library to a pillow fort, build increasingly complicated furniture and have fun in surprising environments. Miscommunicate, make terrible mistakes and ask five times the question "who's got the screwdriver?". Keep in mind that if your friends become absolutely unbearable for you, you can always throw them out the window and let them drift away into the infinity of space.

A wide level variety


What happens when you build furniture in the dark, in zero-g or in a ship disintegrating in space? How will you tackle the challenges in a burning kitchen, a flooded bathroom or a living room where the dog won't leave you alone?
In Kallax, no less than 92 surprising and varied levels await you, not to mention the bonus mini-games!

data.short_description: Kallax is a chaotic furniture-building coop game in which only one player can read the instruction manual. Experience what should have been a one person's job and lose friendships forever.
